name: artbook-next
description: Generates artwork to complement the theme 'Artbook Next'

name: cartwheel
description: Templates that focus on carts and boxes, works best with 3rd, 4th and 5th gen systems.

name: friends-of-boxart-buddy
description: These simple boxart styles can be used standalone and were provided by users on the muOS Discord server

name: game-logo-list
description: Provide styles that focus on the game logo (a.k.a wheel). Can complement a variety of themes.

name: minimal
description: Generate boxart in the style of 'minUI' a minimal, text based interface. Variant included with screenshot in background

name: theme-specific
description: Provide support for a variety of third party themes
